title: Worg
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14
description | Keen Hearing and Smell | The worg has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

description | Bite | Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
